citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility has a written enrichment plan and and has been routinely providing enrichment for each bird species housed
at the facility. However, personnel report that the written enrichment program that covers birds has not been formally
approved by the Attending Veterinarian (AV). Approval of the enrichment plan by the AV helps maintain enrichment
provided is species-appropriate for the birds at the facility. Ensure that the written environmental enhancement plan is
reviewed and approved by the AV.
***Correct by 5/31/2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with an animal technician/caretaker.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility has a written enrichment plan and and has been routinely providing enrichment for each bird species housed 
at the facility. However, personnel report that the written enrichment program that covers birds has not been formally 
approved by the Attending Veterinarian (AV). Approval of the enrichment plan by the AV helps maintain enrichment 
provided is species-appropriate for the birds at the facility. Ensure that the written environmental enhancement plan is 
reviewed and approved by the AV.  
***Correct by 5/31/2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with an animal technician/caretaker. 
 
 n
